comments.body: Though I get what you're trying to do here, I'm not sure this is actually faster in this case since the list is only length one. It may be cleaner to leave this as is, what are other reviewers opinions?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -279,7 +279,8 @@ private[history] class ApplicationCache(
     time(metrics.loadTimer) {
       operations.getAppUI(appId, attemptId) match {
         case Some(LoadedAppUI(ui, updateState)) =>
-          val completed = ui.getApplicationInfoList.exists(_.attempts.last.completed)
+          val completed = ui.getApplicationInfo(appId)
+            .map(_.attempts.last.completed).getOrElse(false)

comments.body: Makes sense. I'll roll it back.

comments.body: So while reviewing #15248 I think this original change actually might be better, mostly because it removes dependance both the `getApplicationInfoList` method that you're working with in that pr, even if it "looks" less clean.
